Text:

hello @softline.. i'm trying to download a previous upload of yours called the "The Insiders Guide to Happiness" for over a week now but i'm stuck at 87% forever... posting it here so you can see my problem (as i don't know how else to pm you).. would it be possible for you to pls re-seed it again for a few days because its supposed to be NZs best show and I really want to see what its about.. thanks for the help in advance.. :)
I have looked everywhere for Season 3, Episodes 6 and 7 of Heartland. Does anyone know where I can find them?  Any assistance would be greatly appreciated.
